mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_review( user_id, meeting_id, content, last_updated_time, created_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{meetingId}, #{content}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT review_id as reviewId , user_id as userId , meeting_id as meetingId , content as content , created_time as created_time FROM tb_review limit #{page-1}, #{size};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_review SET content = #{content}, last_updated_time = now() WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} and user_id = #{userId}
